class.description: Displays the number of points in a point cloud
Transforms a point cloud by a given transformation
Generates a voxel grid from a point cloud
Extracts all point from a point cloud that lie in a specified box
Extracts all point from a point cloud that lie on one side of a plane
Extracts the timestamp and frame id from a point cloud
Sets the timestamp and frame id from a point cloud
Converts a point cloud to a depth image
Converts a point cloud to an intensity image
Converts a depth image to a point cloud. Optionally uses an intensity image for intensity values
Filter outliers by performing a statistical analysis on each point’s neighborhood, and trimming those which do not meet a certain criteria.
Filter outliers by performing a radius search on each point’s neighborhood, and trimming those which do not meet a certain criteria.
Filter outliers by condition. Currently the Filter only works with ranges in 3D.
Convert a point cloud to a multidimensional matrix structure.
Create a PointCloud from a Pointmatrix
Produce a labeled pointcloud given an corresponding matrix holding the label values. Label matrix and pointcloud have to be of the same size and organization.
Color a labeled pointlcoud to make the labeling visible.
Apply RANSAC on pointclouds to fit certain models.
Takes a model message and creates a marker for rviz
Cluster implementation from pcl
Converts a labled pointcloud to indices
Makes several small point clouds from on cloud by indices from a clustering
Gets model messages with 3 points and trys to find the transformations between the points
Noise filtering done by thresholding.
Get a mask for valid points in the point cloud.
